SIOFF.OL.summary: Siem Offshore Inc., together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates offshore support vessels for the offshore energy service industry. It operates platform supply vessels (PSVs); offshore subsea construction vessels (OSCVs); anchor-handling tug supply vessels (AHTS vessels); other vessels, including fast crew, fast supply, and oil spill recovery vessels; and scientific core-drilling and others. As of March 31, 2020, it had a fleet of 33 vessels, which included seven PSVs, four OSCVs, ten AHTS vessels, two well-intervention vessels, one scientific core-drilling vessel, five Brazilian flagged vessels, and three Canadian flagged vessels comprising AHTS vessels and PSVs. It operates in Norway, North Sea, the Arctic Ocean, Northern Pacific Ocean, West Africa, Australia, South East Asia, Canada, and Brazil. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Kristiansand, Norway. Siem Offshore Inc. is a subsidiary of Siem Europe S.a r.l.
